text.section: This section does not apply to capital expenditures by the Department of Transportation or the Maryland Transportation Authority, in connection with State roads, bridges, or highways.

Before execution, a contract for a capital expenditure other than in connection with a State correctional facility, St. Mary's College of Maryland, Morgan State University, or the University System of Maryland shall be:
reviewed by the Secretary of General Services; and
except as provided in § 12-203 of this subtitle and § 13-108 of this article, after that review, approved by the Board.

Before execution, a contract for a capital expenditure in connection with a State correctional facility shall be:
reviewed by the Secretary of Public Safety and Correctional Services; and
except as provided in § 12-203 of this subtitle, after that review, approved by the Board.

Before execution, a contract for a capital expenditure in connection with the University System of Maryland shall be:
subject to the provisions of Title 4, Subtitle 4 of this article;
approved by the Board of Regents of the University System of Maryland; and
approved by the Board of Public Works.

Before execution, a contract for a capital expenditure in connection with St. Mary's College of Maryland shall be:
subject to the provisions of Title 4, Subtitle 4 of this article;
approved by the Board of Trustees of St. Mary's College of Maryland; and
approved by the Board of Public Works.

Before execution, a contract for a capital expenditure in connection with Morgan State University shall be:
subject to the provisions of Title 4, Subtitle 4 of this article;
approved by the Board of Regents of Morgan State University; and
approved by the Board of Public Works.
